authorized_verification_proof.title: Authorized Verification Proof
authorized_verification_proof.description: Specifies the evidence used to confirm that the applicant is authorized by the property owner to apply for or hold the business licence.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country of the business licence.

licence_holder_family_name.title: Licence Holder Last Name
licence_holder_family_name.description: Licence holder family name of the business licence.

licence_holder_given_name.title: Licence Holder First Name
licence_holder_given_name.description: Licence holder given name of the business licence.

business_trade_name.title: Business / Trade Name
business_trade_name.description: The business name of the operator of the business licence.

licence_expiry_dateint.title: Expiry Date
licence_expiry_dateint.description: The expiry date of the business licence.

primary_address_verification_proof.title: Primary Address Proof
primary_address_verification_proof.description: Specifies the method used to verify the applicant’s primary residential address.

street_number.title: Street Number
street_number.description: The street number that precedes the street name of the business licence location.

identity_verification_proof.title: Identity Verification Proof
identity_verification_proof.description: Specifies the method and proofs used to confirm the applicant’s identity.

strata_flag.title: Strata Flag
strata_flag.description: Indicates whether the property is part of a strata (condominium) development.

business_sub_type.title: Business Sub-Type
business_sub_type.description: The sub type of business licence being issued.

licence_summary.title: Licence Summary
licence_summary.description: A concatenated summary of the business licence number and expiry date.

unit.title: Unit Number
unit.description: The unit number of the business licence.

short_address.title: Short Address
short_address.description: A shortened address string consisting of unit, street number, and street name of the licensed property.

licence_number.title: Licence Number
licence_number.description: The issued licence number of the business licence.

municipality_status.title: Municipality Status
municipality_status.description: Municipality type of the licensed location.

municipality.title: Municipality
municipality.description: The municipality of the business licence.

licence_valid_from_dateint.title: Licence Start Date
licence_valid_from_dateint.description: The date on which the business is permitted to begin operating under the issued licence.

province_territory.title: Province / Territory
province_territory.description: The province or territory of the business licence.

property_owner_proof.title: Property Owner Proof
property_owner_proof.description: Specifies the evidence provided to demonstrate legal ownership of the property associated with the business licence.

local_area.title: Neighbourhood / Local Area
local_area.description: Local area definition. For Vancouver, one of the twenty-two neighbourhoods where the licensed location exists.

postal_code.title: Postal Code
postal_code.description: The postal code of the business licence.

street_name.title: Street Name
street_name.description: The street name of the business licence.

unit_type.title: Unit Type
unit_type.description: The unit type of the business licence.

licence_revision_number.title: Licence Revision Number
licence_revision_number.description: The revision number of the issued business licence.

number_of_dwelling_unitsint.title: Number of Dwelling Units
number_of_dwelling_unitsint.description: The number of dwelling units at the licensed location. Specific to LTR business licence types.

licence_issued_dateint.title: Issue Date
licence_issued_dateint.description: The issued date of the business licence.

regional_district.title: Regional District
regional_district.description: One of the twenty-seven regional districts in British Columbia.

location_type.title: Location Type
location_type.description: The type of business licensed location.

GIS_coordinates.title: GIS Coordinates
GIS_coordinates.description: The geographic coordinates of the licensed location.
